definition: a small furry animal that says meow
example_sentence: The cat slept by the window.

definition: an animal that barks
example_sentence: The dog ran across the yard.

definition: the bright star that lights Earth
example_sentence: The sun warmed our faces.

definition: a drawing that shows places
example_sentence: We used a map to find the park.

definition: a tool used for writing with ink
example_sentence: I used a pen to sign my name.

definition: a farm animal that says oink
example_sentence: The pig rolled in the mud.

definition: a color like a fire truck
example_sentence: She wore a red hat.

definition: to jump with both feet
example_sentence: We hop over puddles.

definition: an animal that lives in water
example_sentence: The fish swam in circles.

definition: a large boat for water travel
example_sentence: The ship crossed the bay.

definition: to talk in a friendly way
example_sentence: We chat after lunch.

definition: not thick; narrow from side to side
example_sentence: The thin book fit in my bag.

definition: a word used to point to something
example_sentence: That kite is bright blue.

definition: a musical instrument you hit to make sound
example_sentence: He played the drum in music class.

definition: a piece of cloth used as a symbol
example_sentence: The flag waved in the wind.

definition: to hit your hands together
example_sentence: Please clap for the performers.

definition: to end movement or action
example_sentence: We stop at the red light.

definition: a home birds build for eggs
example_sentence: A nest sat high in the tree.

definition: a white drink from cows
example_sentence: I poured milk on my cereal.

definition: the part of your arm with fingers
example_sentence: Raise your hand to answer.

definition: a round shape; also a small band worn on a finger
example_sentence: The ring was too loose.

definition: a piece of music with words
example_sentence: We sang a song together.

definition: a male ruler of a kingdom
example_sentence: The king wore a heavy crown.

definition: water that falls from clouds
example_sentence: Rain tapped on the roof.

definition: a tall plant with a trunk and branches
example_sentence: The tree gave us shade.

definition: a vehicle that travels on water
example_sentence: We rode the boat at the lake.

definition: the place where you live
example_sentence: We walked home after school.

definition: a two-wheeled vehicle you pedal
example_sentence: My bike has a blue bell.

definition: a solid shape with six square faces
example_sentence: The toy block was a cube.

definition: a bright object seen in the night sky
example_sentence: One star shone above us.
